I used to be more spontaneous with my painting.
I can swim if I have to, but I prefer to save my energy for my vintage cars.
i have six siblings.

i am witty.

participant_2.background:
I eat breakfast with my grandpa before he takes me to get ice cream.
i work in retail.
My dogs are always there to greet me when I get home, no matter how bad my day has been.
my next job will be in the federal court.
I'm afraid to come out to my family.

content.text: Hello, how are you doing today?
Hi! I'm doing well, thank you for asking.
That's great to hear. I'm doing well too.
That's good to hear. What do you do for a living?
I'm a painter. I used to be more spontaneous with my paintings, but now I prefer to save my energy for my vintage cars.
That's interesting. I work in retail.
Oh, that must be fun. I love shopping.
It can be fun, but it can also be stressful.
I bet. I'm sure your dogs help to relieve some of the stress.
Yes, they do. They're always there for me, no matter what.
That's great. I'm glad you have them.
Me too. What are your hobbies?
I love to swim, but I don't get to do it as much as I would like to. I also like to paint and spend time with my family.
That sounds like a lot of fun. I like to eat breakfast with my grandpa before he takes me to get ice cream.
That sounds like a great way to start the day.
It is. I love spending time with my grandpa.
I'm glad. What are you looking forward to in the future?
I'm looking forward to starting my new job in the federal court.
That's exciting! I'm sure you'll do great.
Thank you. I hope so.
I'm sure you will.
